com.icodici.universa.node.network

Interface BasicHTTPService.Response

  • Enclosing interface:
    BasicHTTPService

    public static interface BasicHTTPService.Response
    HTTP response abstraction

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      net.sergeych.tools.Binder getHeaders()
      Get mutable headers object.
      void setBody(byte[] bodyAsBytes)
      Set the body to specific value.
      void setBody(java.lang.String bodyAsString)
      Set the body to specific value.
      void setResponseCode(int code)
      Set the HTTP response code to specific value.

    • Method Detail

      • getHeaders

        net.sergeych.tools.Binder getHeaders()
        Get mutable headers object. It means that if the caller mutate returned Binder, it should change the response headers sent to the network. All calls to this method should return the same instance!
        Returns:
        response headers.

      • setBody

        void setBody(java.lang.String bodyAsString)
        Set the body to specific value.
        Parameters:
        bodyAsString - body in the form of String. Must return in UTF-8 encoding and set appropriate headers. if the mime-type header was not set, set it to application/text

      • setBody

        void setBody(byte[] bodyAsBytes)
        Set the body to specific value.
        Parameters:
        bodyAsBytes - body in the form of byte array. if the mime-type header was not set, set it to application/octet-stream

      • setResponseCode

        void setResponseCode(int code)
        Set the HTTP response code to specific value.
